author: Eric Garland
title: Obama graying through the years
text:
Obama graying through the years By Eric Garland - 08/04/15 09:00 AM EDT 
As President Obama turns another year older on Tuesday, he is aiming to finish his last term off with the same youthful energy he had when he first took office - but his hair isn’t getting the message. ADVERTISEMENT Obama’s hair has become noticeably grayer since he first took office in January, 2009.
While the rigors of the presidency might have replaced his once dark hair with a coat of silver, Obama certainly isn’t letting a little aging get him down. 
Here’s a look at how the president’s hair has changed from when he was first sworn in to present day.
